name: xiaomi mi tv p1 43"
description:
Product Features:
• Bezel-less design for a unique viewing experience
• 360° Bluetooth remote control that works from any direction
• Connect multiple devices for more entertainment
• Quad-core processors for greater possibilities, 2GB + 16GB storage setup
• Dolby Audio®and DTS-HD® decoding for powerful 3D sound
• Supports wall mounting

Product Specification:
• Display Type: Limitless 4K display, MEMC
• Resolution: 3,840 x 2,160
• Operating system: Android TV™ 10
• Colour gamut: NTSC 72%(typ), DCI-P3 78%(typ), BT709 95%(typ)
• Colour depth: 1.07 billion (8-Bit + FRC)
• Refresh rate: 60Hz
• Viewing angle: 178°(H)/178°(V)
• Sound Technology: Dolby Audio, DTS-HD
• Bluetooth 5.0 + Wi-Fi 2.4GHz/5GHz
• Processor: MediaTek MT9611
• Power: 105W
• Voltage: 100-240V ~ 50/60Hz

Package Contents:
• 360° Bluetooth remote control
• Screws bag
• Stand components x2
• User manual
• Power cable
